sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS2610 ( DPOB_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , EMYMT_DIV_CD , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MN_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MNTH_STD_TM_NUM , WKDY_EXTNN_BUD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_DAY_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_NUM_DYS , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_TM_NUM , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #stpInttnSeptVal# , #emymtDivCd# , #wkdyNorDutyTmNum# , #wkdyMnDutyTmNum# , #wkdyMnthStdTmNum# , #wkdyExtnnBudTmNum# , #pubcHodyNorDutyTmNum# , #pubcHodyDayStdTmNum# , #pubcHodyMnthBudNumDys# , #pubcHodyMnthBudTmNum# , #servcDutyTmStpSeilNum# , #workBusinNum# , #workUntBusinNum# , #mangeUntBusinNum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS2610 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM=#wkdyNorDutyTmNum# , WKDY_MN_DUTY_TM_NUM=#wkdyMnDutyTmNum# , WKDY_MNTH_STD_TM_NUM=#wkdyMnthStdTmNum# , WKDY_EXTNN_BUD_TM_NUM=#wkdyExtnnBudTmNum# , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM=#pubcHodyNorDutyTmNum# , PUBC_HODY_DAY_STD_TM_NUM=#pubcHodyDayStdTmNum# , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_NUM_DYS=#pubcHodyMnthBudNumDys# , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_TM_NUM=#pubcHodyMnthBudTmNum# , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum# , WORK_BUSIN_NUM=#workBusinNum# , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#workUntBusinNum# , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#mangeUntBusinNum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS2610 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , EMYMT_DIV_CD , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MN_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MNTH_STD_TM_NUM , WKDY_EXTNN_BUD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_DAY_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_NUM_DYS , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_TM_NUM , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2610 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , EMYMT_DIV_CD , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MN_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MNTH_STD_TM_NUM , WKDY_EXTNN_BUD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_DAY_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_NUM_DYS , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_TM_NUM , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2610 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS2610 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
